Kate Azuka Omenugha bu kọmishona nke mmụta isi,Anambra steeti, Nigeria
Amụru Kate na ụbọchị nke iri atọ  na ọ nwa jenụwarị na afo  1965
Kate Azuka Omenugha ,onye a mụrụ na ezinụlọ Nwagwu  na Ubaha Nnobi, obodo dị na Idemmili South Local Government area, Anambra Steeti Nigeria
Nna ya Chief E
B
Nwagwu bụ onye nkuzi ma ọ tolitere site n'otu ụlọ akwụkwọ gaa na nke ọzọ ka a na-ebufe nna ya n'ihi ya ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ praịmarị na St
Maryãs Primary School, Neni site na afọ 1971rue na afọ 1972, O gukwara akwụkwọ na Girls Practising Skul Adazi Nnukwu site na afọ 1972 rue na afọ 1974

Guzikwa Community and Primary school, Adazi Ani na afọ 1975. Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Ojiakor Memorial Secondary Skul, Adazi Ani site na afọ 1975 rue na afọ 1976 wee gụchaa ya na Maria Regina Comprehensive Secondary School
Ọ kụziri dị ka onye nkuzi enyemaka na Metuh Secondary School Onitsha na afọ 1980 rue na afọ 1981 tupu ọ banye na College of Education, Nsugbe (nke bụzi Nwafor-Orizu College of Education)

N'afọ 1983, ọ nwetara asambodo mba na agụmakwụkwọ site na Nwafor Orizu College of Education, Nsugbe, Anambra Steeti Nigeria, nzere bachelọ na agụmakmakwụkwọ / Bekee site na Mahadum Naịjirịa n'afọ 1987 na nzere masta na Mass Communication n'afọ 1998 site n'otu mahadum ahụ. O nwekwara PhD na Gender, Media and Cultural Studies n'afo 2005 site na Mahadum Gloucestershire, United Kingdom.

Kate Omenugha jere ozi dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Queen of Rosary College, Onitsha obere oge n'afo 1988 tupu ọ gawaa Girls' Secondary School, Awka Etiti ebe ọ nọrọ afọ iri wee ghọọ osote onye isi tupu ọ banye na usoro Mahadum dị ka onye nkụzi na afọ 1998
Ọ bụ onye isi, Ngalaba Mass Communication, Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe site na afọ 2006 rue na afọ 2012

Ọ bụkwa onye isi ntuzi aka UNIZIK 94.1 FM, ụlọ ọrụ redio obodo nke Mahadum ya na-achịkwa. E mere ya Kọmishọna, Ministri nke Mmụta site na afọ 2014 rue na afọ 2018, Anambra Steeti ma ghọọ Kọmishọna nke Mmụta Isi site na afọ 2014 ruo ugbu a n'otu Steeti ahụ. Ọ bụ osote onye isi oche  na South East, Association of Communication Scholars and Professionals, Nigeria (ACSPN).
N'okpuru nlekọta ya dị ka onye kọmishọna na Ministry of Education na Anambra Steeti, ụmụ akwụkwọ na ndị nkuzi enwetala ọtụtụ nturu ugo  niile sitere na idu ndú ya
Ndị a gụnyere;
Kate Omenugha lụrụ Dr
Michael Omenugha, onye dọkịta onwe, onye si Umuru Ebenesi, Nnobi
Ha nwere ụmụ isii.
Ezinụlọ
Omenugha lụrụ Dr
Michael Omenugha, onye ahụ ike nnoro onwe si Umuru Ebenesi, Nnobi.
Ha nwere ụmụ isii
